text.content:
To your thinky Bits

Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} until healed.

Bludgeoning

Clean Through

Triple damage.

Piercing

Wide Open

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the end of its next turn.

Slashing

Hoarder's Wrath

Triple damage to dragons. Double damage to all other creatures.

Bomb or Spell
